overview: In Indonesia, there has always been a rivalry between football supporters. Rivalries frequently lead to conflicts within the club or with other clubs. "Pasoepati," the Persis Solo's supporter club, has a highly respected figure known as "Bunda" (Mother).  "Bunda" has been a part of Pasoepati since its establishment. With her motherly approach and professional background as a psychology lecturer, "Bunda" serves as a mediator and problem solver for Pasoepati. "Bunda" Kris Pujiatni seems to dedicate her life to Pasoepati.
title: Sosok Bunda Dibalik Pasoepati
